In England, in the seven days to 17 August, there were 181,230 new confirmed cases (320.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 10 August, there were 173,334 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 5% (7,896 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 22 August is 5,660,725 (10,010.1 cases per 100,000 population).
